00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 #include <string.h>
00035 
00036 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00037 
00038 #include "BLI_dynlib.h"
00039 
00040 struct DynamicLibrary {
00041     void *handle;
00042 };
00043 
00044 #ifdef WIN32
00045 
00046 #include <windows.h>
00047 #include "utf_winfunc.h"
00048 #include "utfconv.h"
00049 
00050 DynamicLibrary *BLI_dynlib_open(char *name)
00051 {
00052     DynamicLibrary *lib;
00053     void *handle;
00054 
00055     UTF16_ENCODE(name);
00056     handle= LoadLibraryW(name_16);
00057     UTF16_UN_ENCODE(name);
00058 
00059     if (!handle)
00060         return NULL;
00061 
00062     lib= MEM_callocN(sizeof(*lib), "Dynamic Library");
00063     lib->handle= handle;
00064         
00065     return lib;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void *BLI_dynlib_find_symbol(DynamicLibrary *lib, const char *symname)
00069 {
00070     return GetProcAddress(lib->handle, symname);
00071 }
00072 
00073 char *BLI_dynlib_get_error_as_string(DynamicLibrary *lib)
00074 {
00075     int err;
00076 
00077     /* if lib is NULL reset the last error code */
00078     err= GetLastError();
00079     if (!lib)
00080         SetLastError(ERROR_SUCCESS);
00081 
00082     if (err) {
00083         static char buf[1024];
00084 
00085         if (FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM|FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS, 
00086             NULL, err, MAKELANGID(LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
00087             buf, sizeof(buf), NULL))
00088             return buf;
00089     }
00090     
00091     return NULL;
00092 }
00093 
00094 void BLI_dynlib_close(DynamicLibrary *lib)
00095 {
00096     FreeLibrary(lib->handle);
00097     MEM_freeN(lib);
00098 }
00099 
00100 #else /* Unix */
00101 
00102 #include <dlfcn.h>
00103 
00104 DynamicLibrary *BLI_dynlib_open(char *name)
00105 {
00106     DynamicLibrary *lib;
00107     void *handle= dlopen(name, RTLD_LAZY);
00108 
00109     if (!handle)
00110         return NULL;
00111 
00112     lib= MEM_callocN(sizeof(*lib), "Dynamic Library");
00113     lib->handle= handle;
00114         
00115     return lib;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void *BLI_dynlib_find_symbol(DynamicLibrary *lib, const char *symname)
00119 {
00120     return dlsym(lib->handle, symname);
00121 }
00122 
00123 char *BLI_dynlib_get_error_as_string(DynamicLibrary *lib)
00124 {
00125     (void)lib; /* unused */
00126     return dlerror();
00127 }
00128     
00129 void BLI_dynlib_close(DynamicLibrary *lib)
00130 {
00131     dlclose(lib->handle);
00132     MEM_freeN(lib);
00133 }
00134 
00135 #endif
